TopicTitle: [0.90] Halo Inspired Paris Class Frigate (LLL required)

Articles.Content:
Paris Class "Science" Frigate (Halo Inspired)

I don't often see many Halo spaceships on here, so I had a go using LLL parts!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/6r56P#0)

Download: [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/669/Paris%20Class%20%22Science%22%20Frigate](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/669/Paris%20Class%20%22Science%22%20Frigate)

For Reference, here is what the ACTUAL Paris Class Frigate looks like

![latest?cb=20101207234343](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/halofanon/images/c/cc/Vladivostok-class_Frigate.png/revision/latest?cb=20101207234343)

\*Please note this was not a COMPLETE representation, I kept it simple and functional so that it can still be practical in KSP game whilst looking stylish! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Is it just me, or does that ship look an awful lot like a gun.

Either way, +rep for the replica!

> 
> that ship look an awful lot like a gun.

That's basically what (human) ships from the Haloverse are. Missile pods, hangers, and a reactor room wrapped around a giant magnetic accelerator cannon.
